headerDisplay: Depending on the sensor type a few adjustments can be made to each individual preference. Try to tweak the values until your use-case is fulfilled.

sensorType.title: sensorType
sensorType.description: The type of motion sensor you are using.

pirPin.title: pirPin
pirPin.description: To which GPIO pin your PIR sensor is connected

timeoutSeconds.title: timeoutSeconds
timeoutSeconds.description: Number of seconds to wait until checking for new movements

cacheSeconds.title: cacheSeconds
cacheSeconds.description: Cache last movement and consider it after timeout. If movements were detected while waiting for timeout restart timeout.

delayMilliseconds.title: delayMilliseconds
delayMilliseconds.description: Number of milliseconds to wait until notifying movement

delayCacheSeconds.title: delayCacheSeconds
delayCacheSeconds.description: Cache last movement and consider it after delay.
